conbody.p: In order to obtain relevant metrics on the progress of your tests as well as the completeness of your requirements, provides test analysis features in both and to make it easier for the entire project team to have a clear view of the overall readiness of the project.

execution log and test suite / test suite collection reports give you an instant insight into how stable your test scripts are. It enables you to locate the root causes of any issues and troubleshoot them quickly.

dashboards and reports allow you to centralize your test data in one place. As a QA manager, you can oversee your team productivity, and the status of product quality by looking at release readiness, requirement coverage, traceability matrix, and many more.
You can also conduct AI image comparison using visual testing in .
For more information about test analysis features, you can refer to these articles:

Besides the built-in features, Katalon also has third-party integration for test analysis such as:
Jira integration
Slack integration
qTest integration
TestRail integration
Rally integration
